radiographic_examinations.findings: Small bilateral pleural effusions, slightly larger on the right; multiple diffuse T2 hyperintense lesions in the liver consistent with cysts or hamartomas; a 2.3 cm area of arterial hyperenhancement in segment 4B; mild intrahepatic biliary tree dilatation; markedly distended gallbladder with wall edema and multiple gallstones; small amount of pericholecystic, perihepatic, and perisplenic free fluid; bilateral renal cortical and parapelvic cysts; multiple rounded T2 hyperintense lesions in the vertebral bodies of T8, T11, and L3.
